post.text: Watch the exclusive new video: Hillary, Tim Kaine, and their families listen to the benediction backstage at the Democratic National Convention, moments after her speech.

comment.author: Mason
comment.text: Hillary with Chris Wallace said that "she is going to rebuild the infrastructures to strengthen jobs". Chris told her thats what Obama did. She replied "he didn't do enough" Here we go again more shovel ready jobs.

replies.author: Raymond
replies.text: More like your jobs will be shipped overseas.

replies.author: Daryn
replies.text: Only Tramp has most of his jobs overseas. A shovel ready job is better than no job, especially for the Tramp uneducated.

replies.author: Libbie
replies.text: "Shovel ready", a.k.a. padding the pockets of liberal donors.

replies.author: Danielle
replies.text: It 'has' been done before.....The New Deal.....FDR....and it worked!!!

replies.author: Tylor
replies.text: No jobs are gonna b created tell they lift regulations on industry, and lower taxes. There is only one candidate that want to lower taxes and it's not Hillary!!
